entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Snow and local blowing snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 50 km/h gusting to 70 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending overnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
